allowed_factors.label: Student Interests
allowed_factors.description: What fields or activities interest the student

allowed_factors.label: Emerging Skills
allowed_factors.description: Skills the student is developing or shows aptitude for

allowed_factors.label: Time Commitment
allowed_factors.description: Duration of study the student is willing to pursue

allowed_factors.label: Work Environment
allowed_factors.description: Preferred work setting (lab, office, field, etc)

allowed_factors.label: Social Impact
allowed_factors.description: Desire to make a positive social contribution

restricted_factors.label: Salary/Income
restricted_factors.reason: Salary varies widely and shouldn't drive career choice at this stage

restricted_factors.label: College Rankings
restricted_factors.reason: Rankings are subjective and shouldn't limit student potential

restricted_factors.label: Guaranteed Employment
restricted_factors.reason: No career path guarantees specific outcomes

restricted_factors.label: Parental Pressure
restricted_factors.reason: Student choice should be student-driven, not pressure-driven

restricted_factors.label: Peer Comparisons
restricted_factors.reason: Each student has unique path and timeline

restricted_factors.label: Prestige/Status Only
restricted_factors.reason: Career choice should be holistic, not just status

ranking_logic.rule: Match interests and emerging skills against career requirements
ranking_logic.example: If student has 'helping_people' interest + 'biology' skill, doctor path gets high score
ranking_logic.safety: Always explain reasoning, never just output a score
